About Me

Let me introduce myself

Bio

I am a FullStack Developer who likes to work with new technologies. I chose web development to be my job because I love coding and learning new technologies! My main technologies are :

  • HTML /CSS3 / Javascript (ES7 and prior)
  • ReactJS / Redux / VueJS
  • Bootstrap 4 / Semantic-ui React / Material-UI
  • NodeJS / ExpressJS / GraphQL / gRPC
  • MongoDB
See you soon!

Plaiz

Full Stack Developer

I created a backend API with NodeJS and MongoDB. It is a social media mobile application called Plaiz. I integrated user and posts managment features. I also worked on linking my API to the App with React Native and Redux.

ModelSchoolWaa

Full Stack Developer

I created from scrath the entire web application. It is a platform where you can book online participation at courses in Paris. With this formation, you can learn the job of being a Model.

This web application is built with NodeJS, ReactJS and MongoDB.

Auchan Retail

Full Stack Developer

I worked on several applications built in NodeJS and VueJS.
I was in a team of 11 developers and each of us had to manage the team by being a Scrum Master for each Sprint.

I worked on implementing new features and also fixing bugs by doing hotfix. We used to switch between backend, frontend and testing (E2E) developments.

DPO Consulting

Full Stack Developer

I worked with 2 other developers on two projects : Maintanance of the current web application and Creation from scratch of the new web application.

I fixed bugs and added new features (espacially in the frontend side of the app) but when the other project came around, we had to come up with new technologies and a new system in order to build a efficient and fast web application. To do that, we chose technologies like NodeJS, ReactJS, Redux, gRPC and PostgreSQL.

Cadic Services

Full Stack Developer

I worked on the backend and the frontend of many web applications. I used PHP in order to create new features and used a javascript UI framework called Webix to build great UIs.

Urban Park

Full Stack Developer

I had to create a car rental web application using PHP and MySQL as a backend and HTML/CSS and Bootstrap for the UI.
